---
title: "Untitled"
author: "David Hugh-Jones"
date: "20/02/2017"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(huxtable)
ht_orig <- huxtable(a = letters[1:5], b = 10 ^ sample(1:5))
ht_orig$b <- formatC(ht_orig$b,  format = 'f', digits = 0)
width(ht_orig) <- 0.25
bgcolor(ht_orig) <- grey(.9)
bgcolor(ht_orig)[,2] <- grey(.8)
bgcolor(ht_orig)[c(2,4),2] <- grey(.9)
bgcolor(ht_orig)[c(2,4),1] <- grey(.8)
ht_orig
```

Alignment:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
align(ht)[,1] <- 'left'
ht
```

Vertical alignment:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
valign(ht)[,1] <- 'top'
ht
```

Column span:

```{r}

ht <- ht_orig
colspan(ht)[1,1] <- 2
ht        
```

Row span:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
ht[1,1] <- 'A rather long block of text'
rowspan(ht)[1,1] <- 2
ht        
```


Table width:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
width(ht) <- 0.5
ht
```

Column width:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
col_width(ht) <- c(.2, .8)
ht
```

Background color:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
bgcolor(ht)[1,1] <- 'green'
bgcolor(ht)[,2] <- rgb(.5, .5, .5)
ht
```
